php.LBL_EXIF_LIBRARY: Exif (améliore la sécurité des fichiers téléchargés)
php.LBL_SYSTEM_STABILITY: Configuration de la stabilité du système
php.LBL_SYSTEM_SECURITY: Configuration de la sécurité du système
php.LBL_SECURITY_ADVISORIES_CHECKER: Failles de sécurité dans les bibliothèques utilisées
php.LBL_CONFREPORT_DESCRIPTION: Permets de vérifier que les paramètres actuels sont alignés avec ceux recommandés.
php.LBL_HELP_SESSION_REGENERATE_ID: Nous vous recommandons d'activer la régénération de l'identifiant de session, cette option rend difficile la prise en charge de la session utilisateur. Les modifications doivent être effectuées dans le fichier de configuration principal.
php.LBL_HELP_HTTPS: SSL est la technologie de sécurité standard pour établir un lien chiffré entre un serveur Web et un navigateur
php.LBL_HELP__HTACCESS: Les fichiers .htaccess peuvent être utilisés pour modifier la configuration du logiciel serveur pour configurer et activer / désactiver des services supplémentaires. YetiForceCRM nécessite l'accès au fichier à certaines fonctions de travail correctement.
php.LBL_HELP_PUBLIC_HTML: Nous vous suggérons d'installer le système de sorte que seul le dossier public_html soit utilisé. Cela améliore la sécurité des données en n'ayant pas accès aux répertoires et fichiers non publics directement à partir de l'adresse
php.LBL_HELP_IMAP: Extension required for communication with Mailbox.
php.LBL_HELP_PDO_MYSQL: Extension enabling communication with MySQL database.
php.LBL_HELP_MYSQLND: Extension enabling communication with MySQL database.
php.LBL_HELP_OPENSSL: Library securing communication of computer networks against eavesdropping.
php.LBL_HELP_CURL: Client-side library that allows sending HTTP requests and retrieving pages and files from servers.
php.LBL_HELP_GD: Allows you to modify graphic files and create your own graphics.
php.LBL_HELP_PCRE: Library written in C, which implements a regular expression engine, inspired by the capabilities of the Perl programming language
php.LBL_HELP_XML: Universal language for transferring and storing data.
php.LBL_HELP_JSON: Text format for exchanging computer data.
php.LBL_HELP_DOM: Extension allows to handle XML documents via DOM API with PHP
php.LBL_HELP_ZIP: Allows to read and save compressed ZIP archives and files located in them.
php.LBL_HELP_MBSTRING: Extension used to manage strings. Used to convert strings to different encodings.
php.LBL_HELP_SOAP: Allows processes running on disparate operating systems to communicate
php.LBL_HELP_FILEINFO: Detects content type and file encoding.
php.LBL_HELP_ICONV: It converts one encodings to any other
php.LBL_HELP_EXIF: Extension enables work with image metadata
php.LBL_HELP_LDAP: Protocol used to access databases that store information in a tree structure.
php.LBL_HELP_OPCACHE: Improves performance by storing compiled byte code in shared memory.
php.LBL_HELP_IMAGICK: Library recommended for securing potentially dangerous graphic files
php.LBL_HELP_OPCACHE_ENABLE_CLI: Enables the opcode cache for the CLI version of PHP
php.LBL_HELP_OPCACHE_MAX_ACCELERATED_FILES: Maximum number of keys in the OPcache hash table
php.LBL_HELP_OPCACHE_INTERNED_STRINGS_BUFFER: Amount of memory used to store interned strings, in megabytes
php.LBL_HELP_OPCACHE_VALIDATE_TIMESTAMPS: Checks for the availability of updated scripts at every update time.
php.LBL_HELP_OPCACHE_REVALIDATE_FREQ: Frequency of checking updates for each request.
php.LBL_HELP_OPCACHE_SAVE_COMMENTS: If disabled, all documentation comments will be discarded from the opcode cache to reduce the size of the optimised code.
php.LBL_HELP_OPCACHE_MEMORY_CONSUMPTION: OPcache shared memory storage size in megabytes
php.LBL_HELP_MAX_CONNECTIONS: Maximum number of simultaneous client connections.
php.LBL_HELP_CLIENTVERSION: Version of client libraries used by PDO driver.
php.LBL_HELP_SERVERINFO: Information about database server to which PDO is connected.
php.LBL_HELP_BULK_INSERT_BUFFER_SIZE: Size in bytes of cache tree for each thread used to speed up the insertion of batch data into MyISAM and Aria tables. Value 0 disables the cache tree.
php.LBL_HELP_KEY_BUFFER_SIZE: Buffer size for index blocks used by MyISAM arrays and shared for all threads.
php.LBL_HELP_THREAD_CACHE_SIZE: Size of server cache threads to be reused.
php.LBL_HELP_QUERY_CACHE_SIZE: Size in bytes available for the query buffer. About 40 KB are required for query cache structures, so setting a smaller size will result in a warning.
php.LBL_HELP_TMP_TABLE_SIZE: Maximum size for temporary tables in memory
php.LBL_HELP_MAX_HEAP_TABLE_SIZE: Maximum size in bytes for MEMORY tables created by user. Setting the variable when the server is active does not affect existing tables, unless they are recreated or changed.
php.LBL_HELP_INNODB_BUFFER_POOL_INSTANCES: If value in innodb_buffer_pool_size is greater than 1GB, it divides InnoDB buffer pool into multiple instances.
php.LBL_HELP_INNODB_BUFFER_POOL_SIZE: Size of InnoDB buffer pool in bytes.
php.LBL_HELP_INNODB_IO_CAPACITY_MAX: Maximum capacity to which InnodDB can extend innodb_io_capacity in emergency.
php.LBL_HELP_CHARACTER_SET_SERVER: Default character set used by server.
php.LBL_HELP_CHARACTER_SET_DATABASE: Character set used by the default database and set by server after each change of the default database.
php.LBL_HELP_CHARACTER_SET_CLIENT: Specifies character set for queries from client.
php.LBL_HELP_CHARACTER_SET_CONNECTION: Character set used to convert numbers to characters, as well as to literals that do not have an introductory character set.
php.LBL_HELP_CHARACTER_SET_RESULTS: Character set used to display results and error messages from client.
php.LBL_HELP_CHARACTER_SET_SYSTEM: Character set used by server to store identifiers, always set to utf8.
php.LBL_HELP_CHARACTER_SET_FILESYSTEM: Character set for file system. Used to convert filenames specified as a string literal from character_set_client to character_set_filesystem before file opening.
